if.test: start !='' and end !='' and start !=null and end !=null

where.if: and str_to_date(o.date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') BETWEEN str_to_date(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AND str_to_date(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')

mapper.select: select * from office o where o.id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE office o SET o.title=#{title} WHERE o.id=#{id}
